title: What happens to people who don't clear the JEE? - Quora

response.answer_text: It totally depends on yourself.if you are in 12th then you have a time to correct your mistakes.First you have dedication and interest in being an engineer because that is going to give confidence of reading day and night for exam.then made a proper plan to study.mark those chapters which is going to provide you a maximum score in exam. I have seen those students spending time on those chapters which do not help you to score good marks in exam. Always keep in mind that your parents have really hope with you that you will do something in life.paste your parents as well as dream iit photo in front of study table and start Studying. Always have a hope .be positive .there is always a way .👍👍👍👍✌️✌️✌️✌️✌️✌️.those want topics that can ask me in comment

If you have passion then give a try again and if not, then do something of your choice and interest. The problem arises when u start thinking that getting into an IIT is the only option for a better career. You need to understand that it's one of the options and not the only option. There are much more important things in life like your health, peace of mind, your motivation and your confidence on yourself. You should not loose that. Every person is unique in their own way. Stay Well, Study Well! Be onfident and you can achieve anything.
